snippet: Ronald O. Ross, superintendent of the Greenburgh Central School District, is charged in a federal lawsuit with using racial, ethnic and other slurs.
abstract: Ronald O Ross, Greenburgh Central School District superintendent in Westchester County, is charged in federal lawsuit with using racial, ethnic and other slurs; lawsuit brought by principal, four teachers and three other school employees claims Ross repeatedly disparaged his staff with bigoted terms, whether they were black or white, Jewish or Muslim, male or female, gay or heterosexual.
lead_paragraph: Ronald O. Ross, superintendent of the Greenburgh Central School District, is charged in a federal lawsuit with using racial, ethnic and other slurs.

headline.main: Alleging Bias, Employees Sue School Official in Westchester
headline.print_headline: Alleging Bias, Employees Sue School Official in Westchester
